text: Hi Team, During Negative Scenario Testing  for Update Batch  operation  response comes with 207 status under that category is coming as string in postman response and in open api specification its type of array .Attaching Snapshot of both openapi specification and postman response.Kindly confirm which should we refer and which one is correct?
